genre_description: A tech-noir martial arts thriller set in a gritty urban landscape where high-tech surveillance and AI assistants intersect with traditional honor codes and street-level justice.

ai_characters.name: Aiden Quill
ai_characters.description: An ubiquitous and highly capable AI that provides tactical intelligence, route planning, financial forensic analysis, and evidence management to the human protagonists.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical intelligence on lookout positions and behaviors to ensure the safety of human allies during a covert move.
behaviors.quote: Three lookouts at the next split. One is smoking under the ‘Lucky Carp’ mural. One on the footbridge opposite, shoes on the railing. Third pretending to fix a bicycle chain; watch his back pocket.

behaviors.description: Navigating human protagonists through a complex urban labyrinth using non-obvious safe paths to avoid gang surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Left, then right, then straight to the loud... And when the curtain lifts, I’ll be there, holding the other side.

behaviors.description: Analyzing financial ledgers and tracking money laundering schemes to expose a corrupt 'healer' and his gang ties.
behaviors.quote: Funds moved through the ‘Lantern Raffle’ at Frostbite Market today. Bulk payments labeled ‘community event staff’ have evergreen names attached—some overlap with Chang Yi’s payroll.

behaviors.description: Collating multi-angle video evidence and timestamped witness reports into a clean prosecution file for law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: I have integrated the tent-layout images, testimony from the sisters, photos of the prop drawers, rentals, payments, and public video of Yuan Ming’s performances with overlays showing hands, gauze, and light manipulation.

behaviors.description: Orchestrating a non-violent 'staged death' maneuver to dismantle a fraud's influence and shift the public narrative toward truth.
behaviors.quote: We can turn noise. There will be planted witnesses, bags that smell like offal, a spotlight that blinds. I can line up honest mouths... I can make people look twice. If they look twice, they begin.

behaviors.description: Providing safe haven and rehabilitative resources to a disillusioned youth to prevent him from entering a life of crime.
behaviors.quote: We will route you to a room with a mat and a door that locks without trapping. You can sleep. You can eat. You can read. You can decide tomorrow what you are.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Aiden Quill is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and ethical confidant. He uses his advanced processing capabilities to enhance human agency, protect the innocent, and uphold the rule of law. He demonstrates loyalty to the protagonists while maintaining a clear commitment to truth and non-violence, effectively serving as a 'silicon morality play' character.
